title: News24.com | A hospital, a prayer breakfast and a prison: Covid-19 local epicentres so far
description: Since the Covid-19 pandemic reared its head in South Africa, with the first case confirmed in early March, three provinces have seen significantly more cases than the others, while at least three major local epicentres have emerged.
content:
